Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The player class stores a players current information; current room, inventory. One field of 'Room' type stores the players current room. There is an ArrayList of 'Item' class, that contains the players current inventory. There are two String fields (name and description) that are needed to make the inventory print.
    Version:
    (Escape:V1)
    Author:
    (Anthony Wythe)
